received: Did they acknowledge receipt of the request?
data_format: What format did they supply the data in?
reason_for_refusal: If they refused to supply the data, what was the reason for their refusal?
publicly_available: Was the register publicly available at the time of the request?
patient_information: Does the response include potentially identifiable patient information?
recipient_(named): Does it include the name of each recipient?
donor: Does it include the identity of (non-patient) donors?
cash_amount: Does it include the cash amount for each disclosure?
disciplinary: Did they provide an account of disciplinary hearings related to conflicts of interest?
referred_to_abpi: Did they refer to ABPI database as part of their response?
